name: AF-ZERO (itch)
description:
AF-ZERO is a shooting em up based on 80's games. The game contains 7 stages, scenarios with multiple scroll, 3 different weapons with 3 levels of power, several enemies.

The story goes after an alien virus invades the system of a military base on the moon, only the prototype AF-ZERO has not been infected, now this spacecraft along with its pilot Vania Scorpion will have to find the source of the virus and destroy it.
